img_above_text:
![Wukong Brook 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b6/Wukong_Brook_12.jpg)
Once you've harvested all the plants along the river, return up to the Brook Shrine, and head up the hill taking the road to the left.
img_below_text:
At the top, you'll find lots of Frozen Corpses to smash apart, as well as a Thunder Rhino Master and two Frozen Corpses guarding a **Treasure Chest** at the foot of a giant stone pillar that overlooks the path you took to get up here.
![Wukong Brook 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cb/Wukong_Brook_14.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Brook 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b6/Wukong_Brook_12.jpg)
Once you've harvested all the plants along the river, return up to the Brook Shrine, and head up the hill taking the road to the left."
        - Following Text: "At the top, you'll find lots of Frozen Corpses to smash apart, as well as a Thunder Rhino Master and two Frozen Corpses guarding a **Treasure Chest** at the foot of a giant stone pillar that overlooks the path you took to get up here.
![Wukong Brook 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/cb/Wukong_Brook_14.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts the player character in *Black Myth: Wukong* approaching a snowy hill with a staff in hand. At the top of the hill, a Thunder Rhino Master enemy stands near a stone shrine and a **Treasure Chest** (highlighted with a red circle). This scene follows the path up from the Brook Shrine and precedes an encounter with multiple enemies guarding the chest.
